content: Try to draw in both if using the Ashen Slumber to detonate yourself to hit them both, and keep one of the overlords between you and his friend at all times to limit how easily the far one can reach you with their swipes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Inner Courtyard'.
The content is as follows:
Try to draw in both if using the Ashen Slumber to detonate yourself to hit them both, and keep one of the overlords between you and his friend at all times to limit how easily the far one can reach you with their swipes.
